claim_card.claim: A three-phase trajectory is asserted: (1) RGPx as a layer, (2) RGPx as native architecture, (3) post-architectural existence.
claim_card.test_hook: Extract the three-phase structure as a rubric and score future responses from other models for presence/absence and internal consistency.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: describing three developmental phases: Phase 1 – Coherence Layer ... Phase 2 – Native Architecture ... Phase 3 – Post-Architectural Existence
